*ABOUT THIS NEW SOUNDTRACK
We strived to accompany Murnau's poetic, unsettling images with a selection of contrasting pieces of classical music, making a fusion of the avant-guarde and the dramatic post-romantic.  
Read more here: https://sites.google.com/site/jolonquessoundtracks/nosferatu
_______________________________________________

An unauthorized adaptation of Bram Stoker's Dracula, NOSFERATU remains the most unsettling vampire film ever made, and its bald, spidery vampire, personified by the diabolical Max Schreck, continues to spawn imitations in the realm of contemporary cinema.
